content: single_crochet around round 7 color change to outer eye color single_crochet around round 8 single_crochet around round 9 color change to inner eye color repeat around single_crochet decrease 2 single_crochet round 10 color change to black repeat around single_crochet decrease single_crochet round 11 single_crochet decrease around and finish off assembly attach the eyes to the head using a yarn needle and yarn of the secondary base color i would recommend pinning the eyes on and trying on the hat before permanently attaching them
